sourcesContent:
import { products } from 'src/assets/products-data.json'; import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import productsData from "src/assets/data/products.json"; interface Product { name: string; price: number; properties: string[]; manufacturer: string; } @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { products: Product[] = productsData; console.log(this.products) filteredProducts: Product[]; selectedProperties: string[] = []; selectedManufacturer: string | undefined; constructor() { this.filteredProducts = this.products; } applyFilters() { let filteredProducts = this.products; if (this.selectedProperties.length > 0) { filteredProducts = filteredProducts.filter((product) => { for (let property of this.selectedProperties) { if (!product.properties.includes(property)) { return false; } } return true; }); } if (this.selectedManufacturer) { filteredProducts = filteredProducts.filter((product) => { return product.manufacturer === this.selectedManufacturer; }); } this.filteredProducts = filteredProducts; } }
